import React from 'react' import Title from '../common/title/Title' import { homeAbout } from "../../dummydata" import AWrapper from './AWrapper' import "./about.css" import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' const AboutCard = () => { const [t] = useTranslation("global"); return ( <>
<div className='items'> {homeAbout.map((val) => { return ( <div className='item flexSB'> <div className='img'> <img src={val.cover} alt='' /> </div> <div className='text'> <h2>{t(`aboutcard.${val.title}`)}</h2> <p>{t(`aboutcard.${val.desc}`)}</p> </div> </div> ) })} </div> </div> </div> </section> <AWrapper /> </>) } export default AboutCard
